name: The 200 Million Year Long Dream
nutshell:
Artist’s Twitter

Creator-approved translations by Hachirumi Scans.

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: CULTURE SHOCK (Doujinshi)
nutshell: The year is 2030 in Midnight City, USA. Josiah Jones, an ex-convict, faces the cruel changes that have undergone his home city. While crime, gang violence, and political corruption wreak havoc throughout the city, Josiah must find where he belongs in the world all the while facing strange humans with even stranger powers. This is a fan-creation inspired by the works of Hirohiko Araki in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure (ジョジョの奇妙な冒険)

name: Doutei Joshi Shinsatsu-shitsu, Okuchi no Ishi wa Shojo Danshi Bangai-hen
nutshell:
Eiko, the daughter of a respected dentist, was set up in an arranged marriage with Shuichi, a brilliant dentist, for the sake of her family! Eiko immediately tried conceive a baby with Shuichi even without love, but for some reason, Shuichi refused to have sex with her! Little by little, he kept touching her in all her sensitive places... until her mind and body are getting all confused...!!
This is a spinoff of "Okuchi no Ishi wa Shojo Danshi", about the relationship between Sakura's parents.

name: Woof Woof Again Today!
nutshell:
시골 개 오월이는 하룻밤 사이에 인간이 되고 만다.
인간 사회에 적응하기 위해 다니게 된 학교에서 옛 주인님 윤진우를 다시 만나는데…
이렇게 된 이상 주인님과 인간 친구가 되어보자…는 개뿔!
“월이는 주인님 손에 머리 쓰담쓰담 당하고 싶고 손도 핥고 싶고 참을 수 없다구요!”
오월이는 과연 진우와 좋은 관계로 발전해 갈 수 있을까?


Official Simplified Chinese Translation

name: Noob Tryndamere Webtoon
nutshell: Story about a noob one trick tryndamere

name: Zhenniao:  Flying Wing to Wing
nutshell:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that they’re so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.
If you’re here for a human x harpy relationship… Well, let’s just say you won’t be disappointed either.

name: Shigo no sekai demo shinu made hataraku hanashi
Masashi Satou's Room
nutshell: Masashi Satou's childhood friend, Riku, often gets the attention of those wanting to have sex with him. Masashi knows Riku is gay for him, and a past session of pleasuring his friend does not help him. Masashi becomes angered by watching others advance on Riku. What will he do to change how things are?

name: Ume Chirashi, Hana Dorobou - Otona no Koiji wa Toshishita to
nutshell: The manga will start in the Mecha Comic app service on 28th April 2022.

name: I'm Not the Saint, so I'll Just Leisurely Make Food at the Royal Palace
nutshell:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace…? I’ll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!
alt. Raw

name: Haikyuu!! - Nandemo Dekiru Mahou (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata
Kageyama and Hinata discover the magic that happens when they are around each other.

name: Karma - What Goes Around Comes Around
nutshell: Everyone in school knows that Se-Jin is gay. Then why is he chasing after Hyo Won? Isn't she a girl?

name: Lozan
nutshell:
The father of Alexaro Taiy went missing while he was nine years old while on a mission. In spite of the fact that his family is still waiting for the authorities to tell them the truth about his disappearance, weeks after his disappearance occurred.
The military has decided to stop searching for the missing soldier and believe he is dead after a few years. As a result of the higher-ups abandoning the search for his father, Alexaro decides to continue the search for his father instead. He refuses to accept the possibility of his father dying so easily.
Due to his intention to travel the world and meet strong enemies while searching for his father for his adventure, Alexaro joins the military and works hard to become one of the strongest soldiers. However, will he be able to do this alone or will help be needed?

name: Tokyo Hatsu Isekai Yuki
nutshell: A series of cleverly interconnected stories written from multiple POV's, tying together the quirky cast and a number of mysterious (and occasionally hilarious) occurrences in a certain suburb of Tokyo.

name: Don't Mess With the Boss
nutshell: Ling Qingxuan, the goddess who manages the three thousand planes had died in an accident. To take back her life and memories, she had to keep on traveling through the planes and romance the villain protagonists of those planes and stop them from turning evil. To turn the villain protagonists back into ideal protagonists, the goddess would use her actions to declare to all those who would stand in her way: that no matter which world she is in, she is still the boss!

name: Aijin
nutshell:
"Please let me be your lover."
In order to save Okanoue Shopping Center and help his brother continue with his dream of being a concert violinist, Akira, the owner of Sudou Fruits and Vegetables, decides to become the lover of a development company employee. Unbeknownst to him, his lover is Motoya, the grandson of the owner of the company and current head of the division preparing to buy out Okanoe shopping center. Can their relationship withstand the truth?

name: En wa Ki na Mono Aji na Mono
nutshell: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!

name: Yesterday wo Utatte
nutshell: After college, Rikuo Uozumi, a boy without much ambition in life, takes on a job at a convenience store. The days pass by uneventfully for Rikuo until he meets his former love interest and classmate, but especially thanks to the unusual Haru Nonaka, and her pet crow…

name: Stories After Dark: Japan
nutshell: Welcome, reader, to your worst nightmare! Are you prepared to experience some of Asia's most blood-curdling tales, collected for your personal fright? Not for the faint of heart or yellow of liver, you have been warned!

name: Golden Kamuy - Sugimoto Ikka (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Golden Kamuy doujin, focusing on a potential future of Sugimoto and Asirpa.

name: Mazu wa, Hitokuchi
nutshell: Oda and Hasegawa are childhood friends bound by a very special secret: Oda's a third-generation pig farmer on a farm that raises flying pigs. But when a nosy reporter starts investigating tales of upward-mobile porkers in the area, the two must band together – and thereby grow closer in doing so – to protect Oda's family's livelihood, as well as the good-luck-giving swine.

name: Katappashi Kara Zenbu Koi
nutshell: Out of the blue, childhood friend Takaoka confesses to Iwami! When popular playboy and ladies man Takaoka says "I love you", he doesn't believe it one bit. Is he making fun of the virgin!? A modern high-school boys' adolescent love development.

name: Akogare no Rokudemo Nai Hito
nutshell: Suenobu Mako is dragged out to a nightclub by his best friend and somehow ends up bringing home Hiro, a flashy guy he encounters there. However, Hiro leaves the next day without saying a word. Meanwhile, Mako encounters his ideal man in the form of the diligent salaryman, Fukamachi…?!

name: Storm Fairy
nutshell:
A collection of three 50's short shojo serials: Storm Fairy, Kokeshi Detective Agency, and The Story the Clouds Told: Pink Angel.


Storm Fairy:
Set in the Sengoku era, a fairy and a princess swap faces. The fairy grows to be beautiful, while the princess is doomed to be hideous...


Kokeshi Detective Agency:
A bold young girl named Pako solves mysteries with her loyal dog Moru and her cowardly brother Taro.


Pink Angel:
In this world, clouds can take many forms - even the forms of humans. A young cloud named Pink wishes to get involved in the affairs of humans, but others - including Sepia, the daughter of Sir Brown (the leader of the family of clouds that have control over their relationship to humans) disagree.


Official English

Volume 313 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Ring (SHIMABUKURO Mitsutoshi)
nutshell: A story by the mangaka of Toriko and Legend of the End of the Century's Leader Takeshi! about the fictional sport of Ring.

name: Touhou - Summer Heat Haze (Doujinshi)
nutshell: "Even in the worst of the summer heat, Renko is determined to go UFO spotting. Maribel is less than thrilled about it."

name: Eizen Karukaya Kaiitan
nutshell: Obana is an uncanny and incredible house repairman. This is a story of him repairing houses while solving the paranormal events that occurred in those buildings.

name: Touhou - Kagome Kagome, Kago no Naka no Suzuya (Doujinshi)
Seven Knights - Dark Servant
nutshell: A story taking place after the events of Seven Knights 1. What happened to Seyn after her struggle against the demonic power contained within her body? With the curtains drawn, Seyn’s story now unfolds before you!

name: Until You Fall Asleep
nutshell: Irene is very happy when she finds out that her mother is getting remarried and will have an older sister to play with. Laura, on the other hand, is not so happy to see her father getting remarried after so little time since her mother’s death. While the girls start to settle their differences and become more friendly towards each other a dark secret starts to reveal itself.

name: Ai no Houritsu
nutshell: Asuka is the lover of his stepbrother, Rei. However, the differences in their personalities, the appearance of a rival, and other obstacles! This is the story of their love overcoming perversion.
